TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Charles_B_Black, title = Charles_B_Black, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_B_Black} }

S.FORM: Charles B. Black sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1921 , ryax sa tay 15 nqu tay 6, Charles B. Black, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 1992) 196 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 91 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. qyanux nya Black htagan beh sa aytahco aq tmasoq mqwas maki Kansas City, Missouri Southwest pqwasan biru. Black ga sraral mtzyaw maki Kansas ru maki kosi ppqumah. kawas tay 1984 wal wayan mhngaw la maki beh Rogers, Arkansas. hiya ga maki 1992 kawas 12 byacing 22 ryax wal mhuqil la.(pitu' pgal kawas) pincyuwagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yugal yacing masuq mspung mari sa pspngan mari na maycyugal byacing lga cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Charles B. Black sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1921 , ryax sa tay 15 nqo tay 6, Charles B. Black, sqoliq na p'onro. (mhoqil sa kawas tay 1992) 196 konbon kinwagiq nya, 91 konkin kin'sow nya, hiya ga qotox nqo spzyang blaq na ppzoy mari NBA. qyanox nya Black htagan beh sa aytahco aq tmasoq mqwas maki Kansas City, Missoori Soothwest pqwasan biro. Black ga sraral mtzyaw maki Kansas ro maki kosi ppqomah. kawas tay 1984 wal wayan mhngaw la maki beh Rogers, Arkansas. hiya ga maki 1992 kawas 12 byacing 22 ryax wal mhoqil la.(pito' pgal kawas) pincyowagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yogal yacing masoq mspong mari sa pspngan mari na maycyogal byacing lga cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
